collection.body:
Twitter Developer Conference

I created the identity and designed the website for Twitter's Developer conference, Chirp. This site is almost completely hand illustrated. Only the body copy and some of the headings are generated by code, the rest is handmade.
collection.summary: I created the identity and designed the website for Twitter's Developer conference, Chirp. This site is almost completely hand illustrated. Only the body copy and some of the headings are generated by code, the rest is handmade.
collection.title: Twitter Developer Conference
